entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Glasgow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
